$Toggle HUD (Part 1) (Gecko Code) (NARE01)
28F1B5B0 00000001
2131AB1C 00060000
00002FC6 00000000
CC000000 00000001
00002FC6 00000001
E0000000 80008000
28F1B5B0 00000001
2131AB1C 00000000
00002FC8 00000000
CC000000 00000001
00002FC8 00000001
E0000000 80008000
*Press D-Pad Left in the Pause Menu to toggle the HUD
*The HUD remains visible in the Pause Menu
*Press D-Pad Left In-Game to toggle the Hearts meter if the HUD is hidden
*GameCube Controller

$Limit Minimap (Gecko Code) (NARE01)
012A0103 00000000
28F1B5B0 00000004
2131AB1C 00000000
012A0103 00000000
CC000000 00000001
012A0103 00000001
E0000000 80008000
*The Minimap can only be toggled with D-Pad Down In-Game (no other button hold)
*GameCube Controller
